entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cassiar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:12 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow this afternoon. Amount 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
